attributes.action: Reject current proposals to move the road and visitor centre at Stonehenge.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: See Stonehenge from the road, stop for a cup of tea - not any more if the current proposals go ahead. The road would be buried in a tunnel (at an amazing cost) with no view of the monument. The underground visitor's centre, instead of being improved, would be replaced with a modern interpretation facility over a mile away, with deterrant entrance fees.
